item.text: For I do not want you to be unaware, brothers and sisters, that our fathers were all under the cloud and all passed through the sea,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> were <st data-num="907" class="">baptized</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3507" class="">cloud</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2281" class="">sea</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2068">ate</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">same</st> <st data-num="4152" class="">spiritual</st> <st data-num="1033" class="">food</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="4095" class="">drank</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">same</st> <st data-num="4152" class="">spiritual</st> <st data-num="4188" class="">drink</st>. <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> they <st data-num="4095" class="">were</st> all <st data-num="4095" class="">drinking</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="4152" class="">spiritual</st> <st data-num="4073" class="">rock</st> that <st data-num="190" class="">followed</st> them, <st data-num="1161">and</st> the <st data-num="4073" class="">rock</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> was <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2106" class="">pleased</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4183">most</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> they were <st data-num="2693">cut down</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2048" class="">wilderness</st>.

<st data-num="3778">These things</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">happened</st> as <st data-num="5179" class="">examples</st> for <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>, <st data-num="1519">so that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> will <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1938" class="">crave</st> <st data-num="2556">evil things</st> <st data-num="2531" class="">as</st> <st data-num="2548">they</st> <st data-num="1937" class="">did</st>.
So do not be idolaters, as some of them were. As it is written, “The people sat down to eat and drink and rose up to play.”

<st data-num="3366" class="">And</st> let us <st data-num="3366" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4203">be immoral</st>, <st data-num="2531" class="">as</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="4203">were</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1501 5140 5505" class="">23,000</st> <st data-num="4098" class="">died</st> in a <st data-num="1520" class="">single</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="3366" class="">And</st> let us <st data-num="3366" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1598" class="">put</st> <st data-num="5547">Christ</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1598" class="">to the test</st>, <st data-num="2531" class="">as</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="3985" class="">did</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> were <st data-num="622" class="">destroyed</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3789" class="">snakes</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="3366" class="">And</st> do <st data-num="3366" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1111" class="">complain</st>, <st data-num="2509" class="">as</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1111" class="">did</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> were <st data-num="622" class="">killed</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="3644">destroying angel</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="3778">These things</st> <st data-num="4819" class="">happened</st> to <st data-num="1565" class="">them</st> as <st data-num="5179" class="">examples</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> were <st data-num="1125" class="">written</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="3559" class="">instruction</st>, <st data-num="1519" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> the <st data-num="5056" class="">ends</st> of the <st data-num="165" class="">ages</st> have <st data-num="2658" class="">come</st>.

<st data-num="5620" class="">So</st> let the one who <st data-num="1380" class="">thinks</st> he is <st data-num="2476" class="">standing</st> be <st data-num="991" class="">careful</st> that he does <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4098" class="">fall</st>.

No trial has overtaken you that is not faced by others. And God is faithful: He will not let you be tried beyond what you are able to bear, but with the trial will also provide a way out so that you may be able to endure it.
So then, my dear friends, flee from idolatry.

I am <st data-num="3004" class="">speaking</st> to <st data-num="5429">thoughtful people</st>. <st data-num="2919" class="">Consider</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> I <st data-num="5346" class="">say</st>.

<st data-num="1510" class="">Is</st> <st data-num="3756">not</st> the <st data-num="4221" class="">cup</st> of <st data-num="2129" class="">blessing</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> we <st data-num="2127" class="">bless</st> a <st data-num="2842" class="">sharing</st> in the <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>? <st data-num="1510" class="">Is</st> <st data-num="3756">not</st> the <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> we <st data-num="2806" class="">break</st> a <st data-num="2842" class="">sharing</st> in the <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>?

<st data-num="3754" class="">Because</st> there is <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st>, we who are <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> we <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3348" class="">share</st> the <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st>.

<st data-num="991" class="">Look</st> at the <st data-num="2596 4561">people</st> of <st data-num="2474" class="">Israel</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">Are</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> those who <st data-num="2068" class="">eat</st> the <st data-num="2378" class="">sacrifices</st> <st data-num="2844" class="">partners</st> in the <st data-num="2379" class="">altar</st>?

Am I <st data-num="5346" class="">saying</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1497" class="">idols</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1494">food sacrificed to them</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">amount</st> to <st data-num="5100" class="">anything</st>?

<st data-num="235" class="">No</st>, I mean <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> the pagans <st data-num="2380" class="">sacrifice</st><n id="1" /> is to <st data-num="1140" class="">demons</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>. I do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> to <st data-num="1096" class="">be</st> <st data-num="2844" class="">partners</st> with <st data-num="1140" class="">demons</st>.

You <st data-num="3756 1410">cannot</st> <st data-num="4095" class="">drink</st> the <st data-num="4221" class="">cup</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4221" class="">cup</st> of <st data-num="1140" class="">demons</st>. You <st data-num="3756 1410">cannot</st> <st data-num="3348">take part in</st> the <st data-num="5132" class="">table</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="5132" class="">table</st> of <st data-num="1140" class="">demons</st>.
Or are we trying to provoke the Lord to jealousy? Are we really stronger than he is?
“Everything is lawful,” but not everything is beneficial. “Everything is lawful,” but not everything builds others up.

Do <st data-num="3367" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2212" class="">seek</st> <st data-num="1438">your own</st> <st data-num="3588">good</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3588">the good</st> of the <st data-num="2087">other person</st>.

<st data-num="2068" class="">Eat</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">anything</st> that is <st data-num="4453" class="">sold</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3111" class="">marketplace</st> <st data-num="3367" class="">without</st> <st data-num="350" class="">questions</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">of</st> <st data-num="4893" class="">conscience</st>,
for the earth and its abundance are the Lord’s.

<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> an <st data-num="571" class="">unbeliever</st> <st data-num="2564" class="">invites</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> to dinner <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> to <st data-num="4198" class="">go</st>, <st data-num="2068" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">whatever</st> is <st data-num="3908" class="">served</st> <st data-num="3367" class="">without</st> <st data-num="350">asking questions</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">of</st> <st data-num="4893" class="">conscience</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">someone</st> <st data-num="3004">says</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, “This <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> from a <st data-num="1494" class="">sacrifice</st>,” do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2068" class="">eat</st>, <st data-num="1223" class="">because of</st> the <st data-num="1565" class="">one</st> who <st data-num="3377" class="">told</st> you <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> because of <st data-num="4893" class="">conscience</st><n id="1" />—

I do <st data-num="3756">not</st> <st data-num="3004">mean</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">yours</st> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="2087">other person’s</st>. <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="2444" class="">why</st> is <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="1657" class="">freedom</st> being <st data-num="2919" class="">judged</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="243">another’s</st> <st data-num="4893" class="">conscience</st>?

<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="3348" class="">partake</st> with <st data-num="5485" class="">thankfulness</st>, <st data-num="5101" class="">why</st> am I <st data-num="987" class="">blamed</st> <st data-num="5228">for</st> the food<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="2168" class="">give thanks</st> for?

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> <st data-num="1535" class="">whether</st> you <st data-num="2068" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="1535" class="">or</st> <st data-num="4095" class="">drink</st>, <st data-num="1535" class="">or</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">whatever</st> you <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st>, <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

Do <st data-num="677" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">give</st> <st data-num="677" class="">offense</st> to <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1672" class="">Greeks</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">or</st> to the <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>,

<st data-num="2531">just as</st> <st data-num="2504">I also</st> try to <st data-num="700" class="">please</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everyone</st> in <st data-num="3956">all things</st>. I do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2212" class="">seek</st> <st data-num="1683">my own</st> <st data-num="4851" class="">benefit</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="4851" class="">benefit</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> they may be <st data-num="4982" class="">saved</st>.
